title: Looking for Aussie, NZ Guild/Clan, Casual with Teamspeak, Raidcall, Mic
body:
Hey guys/girls

Im a Aussie Looking for a new Home

Lvl 15, Haven't played Ranked Yet since i got no team.

Preferred characters i play most:

{{champion:9}}  - Jungle, Support, AP
{{champion:22}}  - ADC
{{champion:267}} - Support
{{champion:15}} - Trial

replies.body:
Hey man,

Check out DarkStar Alliance if your looking for an Aus NZ Guild. 

We're a casual Guild with tons of members across a broad range of games. 

I'd say we're a mix of mature, casual, bit loose at times, very close nit almost family like.
Lots of long lasting friendships, heaps of IRL Lan parties. 

http://www.darkstar-alliance.com

Hey man I'm in a Clan/Community called Zealot Gaming and it's based in NA, EU and OCE and us at OCE would love to have you in.

If you go to http://www.zealotgaming.com/content.php and click on Login or Register at the top right and do everything it says you will then have to talk to someone that is in charge of the OCE side of Zealot Gaming and soon enough can join.
I'll join. Just add me in game
